about_the_game: Elevate your style with The Underwear Gnome Cosmetics Pack! Unleash your fashion creativity with a trendy Underwear Gnome hat, a stylish beard, a vibrant and a green tunic.

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent depiction of fart clouds, feces, urine and other gross ways to use against enemies.
